name: Loopy Warudo
description:
LOOPY WARUDO

Simple 2D Arcade Platformer game, where you can jump to reach the coins, but you do so by going up on a platform. The catch is: the platform remains on the spot you left it, so it turns into an obstacle the next time the world comes around.

(Press SPACEBAR to jump!)

Made for the 8th Black and White Game Jam - Theme: Loop - https://itch.io/jam/black-and-white-jam-8

It's really my first game, but me and my friends had a bunch of fun with it, so I hope you like it!

It also has an Android version below, for those on mobile.

Credits for the assets used as base for the arts in the game (all copyright-free):

- Heart Pixel Art: https://opengameart.org/users/dansevenstar

- Spinning Gold Coin: https://opengameart.org/users/morgan3d

- Music: https://sfx.productioncrate.com/

- Font: https://www.dafont.com/pt/jimmy-campbell.d5241

- SoundFX: https://www.leshylabs.com/apps/sfMaker/
